amendment.description: To repeal requirements for certain reports applicable to other nations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4280 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4280 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S5933-5937; text: CR S5933) To repeal requirements for certain reports applicable to other nations.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4280 proposed by Senator Warner.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4280 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
